Package felixcaban.controllers

Class MainFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • felixcaban.controllers.MainFormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    FXML Controller class for MainForm.fxml. The controller for the initial UI when the application is launched.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    felix.caban

      • handleBtnExitAction

        private void handleBtnExitAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Parameters:
        event - on action.

      • handleBtnPartAddAction

        private void handleBtnPartAddAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the button to navigate to the AddPartForm. Once there the user can add a new Part.
        Parameters:
        event - on action.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if the user can not be sent to the AddPartForm.

      • handleBtnPartModifyAction

        private void handleBtnPartModifyAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the button to navigate to the ModifyPartForm. Once there a user can modify an existing Part.
        Parameters:
        event - on action.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if the user can not be sent to the ModifyPartForm.

      • handleBtnPartDeleteAction

        private void handleBtnPartDeleteAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Handles the button to delete the selected Part. A part must be selected or the user will be prompted to select one.
        Parameters:
        event - on action.

      • handleBtnProductAddAction

        private void handleBtnProductAddAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the button to navigate to the AddProductForm. Once there a user can add a new Product.
        Parameters:
        event - on action.
        Throws:

      • handleBtnProductModifyAction

        private void handleBtnProductModifyAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the button to navigate to the ModifyProductForm. Once there a user can modify an existing Product.
        Parameters:
        event - on action.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if the user can not be sent to the ModifyProductForm.

      • handleBtnProductDeleteAction

        private void handleBtnProductDeleteAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Handles the button to delete the selected Product. A product must be selected or the user will be prompted to select one.
        Parameters:
        event - on action.

      • handlePartSearchAction

        private void handlePartSearchAction​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Handles the entered text in the txtPartSearch text box. Initiates a search on existing Parts in inventory. If the Part exists, it is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - on key press.

      • handleProductSearchAction

        private void handleProductSearchAction​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Handles the entered text in the txtProductSearch text box. Initiates a search on existing Parts in inventory. If the Part exists, it is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - on key press.
